versions.title: 4G Coverage
versions.summary: Percentage of geographic areas with 4G signal outdoors from at least 1 operator (signal threshold: 105dBm), UK, September 2022.
versions.description:
This dataset shows the percentage of geographic areas with 4G signal outdoors from at least 1 operator (signal threshold: 105dBm), in the UK, for September 2022.

### Coverage 

UK

#### Geography definition

Local Authority Districts and Unitary Authorities

### Source

 - United Kingdom: [Ofcom](https://www.ofcom.org.uk/research-and-data/multi-sector-research/infrastructure-research/connected-nations-2022)
